CustomField.description: Populated by CashCreatePrsQable.cls from Payee__c.Payee_Name__c on Payment Record creation when posting Case Payments; or in some instances, by the ReturnedVoidedReceipt.cls when creating Buyback PRs. Used primarily for summing PRs under Payees on the UWF Schedule, and for some verifications during Case Payment posting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for summing PR amounts under Payees on the UWF Schedule.
CustomField.label: Payee Name
